history.text1:
Welcome to the corporate website of the production republican unitary
             enterprises "MINGAZ". The main task of the enterprise is to ensure safe and
             uninterrupted supply of natural and liquefied gas to consumers
history.text2:
The team of the organization is faced with the task, along with ensuring security, in
             in the next few years to expand gasification of regions with natural gas
             individual buildings, villages, settlements of the Minsk region.
history.text3:
UE "MINGAS" constantly changes aging equipment, introduces modern systems
             control over gas distribution modes for all categories of consumers, applies
             Energy Saving Technologies
history.text4:
UE MINGAZ looks to the future with optimism. Relations with consumers and partners
             built on the basis of respect and decency, mutual support. Young and energetic
             the staff of the enterprise adequately carries the experience of the older generation, improves the system
             providing gas to our capital, thereby contributing to prosperity and progress
             The Republic of Belarus
